column1: Nearly 2/3 of parents find child-care activities very meaningful.
column2: Roughly 60% of parents find leisure activities very meaningful.
column3: Roughly 40% of parents find housework activities very meaningful.
column4: Only 1/3 of parents find paid work activities very meaningful.
column5: Child-care activities are deemed most meaningful by parents among the activities listed.
column6: Paid work activities are deemed least meaningful by parents among the activities listed.
